# ClawPilot - LLM Context (Full)

> ClawPilot is the easiest way to install and manage OpenClaw, an open-source personal AI assistant that works inside WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Signal, and iMessage.

## Overview

ClawPilot helps users set up OpenClaw in under 60 seconds. OpenClaw is a self-hosted AI assistant that runs locally on your machine and responds through popular messaging apps. ClawPilot makes installation, connection, and management simple.

## What is OpenClaw?

OpenClaw is an open-source personal AI assistant that:
- Runs locally on your machine
- Responds through messaging apps (WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Signal, iMessage, Teams)
- Keeps your data private - nothing leaves your machine
- Is MIT licensed and community-built

## What is ClawPilot?

ClawPilot is the companion tool that makes OpenClaw accessible:
- One-click installation and setup
- Guided configuration for messaging platforms
- Optional cloud hosting support
- Management dashboard

## Key Features

### Local or Cloud Hosting
- **Self-hosted**: Run OpenClaw on your own machine for complete privacy and control
- **Cloud option**: ClawPilot provides a guided option to host in your own cloud

### Multi-Platform Gateway
Connect to multiple messaging platforms through one OpenClaw gateway:
- WhatsApp
- Telegram
- Slack
- Discord
- Signal
- iMessage
- Microsoft Teams

### Privacy and Safety
- Pairing and allowlists keep access controlled
- Clear options for secure tool use
- Data never leaves your machine when self-hosting
